VoiceUserLine.name: VoiceUserLine
VoiceUserLine.description: Represents a user’s forwarding phone number.

IsCustomCallerId.description: Indicates whether the number is a custom caller ID (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the phone number.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the phone number.

UserId.description: The ID of the user using the phone number.

VendorVerifiedCallerIdKey.description: The ID for a custom phone number provided by the Sales Dialer service provider.

VoiceVendorInfoId.description: The ID of the related Sales Dialer service provider.
